## bodyAsParams type

body of fetch

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type bodyAsParams = string | Object | Array<any>;
```

## Remarks

when method is 'GET'\|'HEAD', try parse to string mainly by URLSearchParam [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URLSearchParams)
